ygData.subject: RE: Twisting bug?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, it happens to me all the time now that I have a fast connection.  It is not song specific as far as I can tell.  Basically what seems to happen is your
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, it happens to me all the time now that I have a fast connection. It is
not song specific as far as I can tell. Basically what seems to happen is
your client message that you restarted the song gets lost by the server
while its sending the song stops message.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:jht@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 05, 2000 2:13 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Twisting bug?


I've noticed the following recently while twisting songs. I'm soloing and
singing Chant/Chains/Hymn and found that sometimes, just as the Chant or
Hymn is about to expire I get the following:

You whistle an ancient warsong.
You stop whistling.

In other words, my song kicks in just before it the buff expires, but still
expires shortly afterwards.

Anyone else know about this as a bug?

Windleaf Mistsong
26th level Balladeer
Bertox
